title: What actually affects metabolism
summary: Consistency, sleep, stress, and muscle mass matter more than hacks.
body: Metabolism responds to activity, recovery, and muscle. Sustainable routines beat quick fixes.

title: GLP-1 realities
summary: GLP-1s can help, but they are not a magic fix.
body: Long-term success still depends on habits, nutrition, and medical oversight.

title: Hormones and long-term health
summary: Hormones can influence energy and weight, but context matters.
body: Labs and symptoms must be interpreted carefully. Focus on long-term health over quick changes.
